attributes.additional_details: After the success of the London 2012 Olympic games it is therefore disappointing only two days latter to hear members of the FA and Welsh FA saying there will not be team GB Olympic football teams in future.  I as a Brit would like to have a permanent team in place and I don't believe it should be up to officials to decide that there is not a team to represent us as it would be beneficial to both men's and women's football and Britain as a whole
